headline: Is AI Data Center Hype And Options Turbulence Altering The Investment Case For Corning (GLW)?
summary: In recent days, Corning has drawn fresh attention after Jim Cramer and other commentators highlighted its role in supplying optical fiber and glass technologies for data centers, smartphones, and broadband networks, while options data pointed to unusually heavy activity from large investors with mixed sentiment. This combination of upbeat commentary on Corning’s potential in fiber-enabled data centers and conflicting signals from derivatives markets has sharpened the debate over how central...
